definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: The bank granted a large loan to the company.
sentences.chinese: 银行贷给这家公司大量款项。

sentences.english: Please remit promptly by money order.
sentences.chinese: 请速将款项用汇票汇来。

sentences.english: The breaking into this money of Vernon's was one of the first great errata of my life;
sentences.chinese: 动用佛南这笔款项是我一生中早期重大的错误之一。

sentences.english: He subscribed a large amount of money to the collection for the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他向为医院而募集的款项捐赠了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: Let's switch the talk to disbursement.
sentences.chinese: 咱们换个话题，谈一谈款项支出吧。

sentences.english: I'll pay you a hundred dollars deposit and the remainder on delivery.
sentences.chinese: 我将付你一佰元定金，其余款项在交货时付讫。

sentences.english: Under what circumstances will the payment be refunded?
sentences.chinese: 医管局在那些特殊情况下会退回预缴的款项？

sentences.english: Payables that cannot be classified as accounts payable.
sentences.chinese: 指不能归属于应付帐款之款项。

sentences.english: All donations and funds collected are for Dharma Activities at the Centre.
sentences.chinese: 所有乐捐款项将作为本寺的弘法用途。

sentences.english: Delos's representatives are not entitled to collect monies due unless they are explicitly authorized to do so.
sentences.chinese: 在未经授权的情况下，道尔的代表无权收集应付款项。

sentences.english: He had only enough money to meet his engagements.
sentences.chinese: 他的钱刚够付约定的款项。

sentences.english: She credited your account with the amount of the cheque.
sentences.chinese: 她把支票款项记入你的账户的贷方。

sentences.english: That just about sums up the influence Reg Kay has had on greyhound racing in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 注册凯只是影响了款项已在澳大利亚赛狗。

sentences.english: I called at the bank and arranged to transfer some money．
sentences.chinese: 我到银行去了一下，安排了款项过户的事宜。

sentences.english: Liquidity risk is the risk of not being able to meet commitments due to a shortage of cash.
sentences.chinese: 周转风险是指因缺乏现金而不能支付承付款项的风险。

definition: to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
